WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 23 DEC BY
   M/V OCEANIC CHAMPION TOWING 12 9260 METER LONG
   CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   21-31.33S 038-21.00W, 21-31.33S 039-39.00W,
   21-45.00S 039-39.65W, 21-45.00S 038-21.00W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 3928/17.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 24 DEC 17.
